thread.title: Fun Buggies make shopping cool for kids at intu Trafford Centre
thread.title_full: Fun Buggies make shopping cool for kids at intu Trafford Centre

author: Emma Gill
title: Fun Buggies make shopping cool for kids at intu Trafford Centre
text:
Fun Buggies make shopping cool for kids at intu Trafford Centre Kids can whizz around in six new double buggies including a 'Rover' and a police car Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Fun buggies at the Trafford Centre Share this video Get What's On   Thank you for subscribing!   
Fun Buggies have just made shopping a whole lot cooler for kids visiting intu Trafford Centre. 
Six new double buggies have joined the fleet at the shopping centre, including a 'Rover' and a police car. 
The miniature cars will no doubt brighten up an often dull trip to the shops for little ones and give them chance to rest their legs in style as they get pushed around. 
They cost £6 an hour to hire and a returnable £20 deposit is required. The older plastic buggies cost £4 an hour but fit just one child inside. 
They're based at the centre's customer service desk on lower Peel Avenue. Read More WIN unlimited rides at the Museum of Science and Industry's Victorian fairground this half term 
A spokesman said:"Let's face it, shopping can be dull for little ones, but not at intu Trafford Centre. 
"Here, you can collect a fun buggy to ward off tired little legs and keep them entertained. And now we're thrilled to announce the launch of a whole new fleet for those little drivers including mini police cars and cool little sports models." 
Suitable identification is required and height restrictions apply. Read More
